markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 9" pfs="Standard">[Unfolding Wind Crash](/Spells.aspx?ID=1252)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You jump up to 120 feet in any direction and then deal 18d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures within a 20-foot emanation after you land, with a basic Reflex save. Creatures who critically fail are also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

---
**Heightened (10th)** The damage increases to 20d6.
name: Unfolding Wind Crash
